abstract: SAP may have a crack at the budding data warehouse market through an acquisition of Teradata, according to one Wall Street analyst.
snippet: SAP may have a crack at the budding data warehouse market through an acquisition of Teradata, according to one Wall Street analyst.
lead_paragraph: The German software maker SAP looks poised to follow its major rivals, Microsoft and Oracle, by making a big splash in the tumultuous market for data warehouse technology, according to one analyst.
